definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: People are worried about the big fish.
sentences.chinese: 人們擔心的是那些頭目。

sentences.english: The Iron Nokana is the fifth boss from Metal Slug: Super Vehicle-001.
sentences.chinese: 黑鐵是合金彈頭的第五個頭目。

sentences.english: Before we can clean up this city, we must arrest the main squeeze .
sentences.chinese: 要清除這座城市的不法之徒，先得逮捕他們的頭目。

sentences.english: Muckraking journalists denounced the titans of American business as "robber barons".
sentences.chinese: 八卦記者曾將美國工商業巨頭直斥爲“強盜頭目”。
“頭目”同樣還會需要一名“軍師”。

sentences.english: The police thought that Arab League bold is the chieftain, dealing in narcotics definitely is he instigates, then issues a warrant for arrest him.
sentences.chinese: 警方認爲阿豪是頭目，販毒肯定是他主使，便通緝他。

sentences.english: The soldiers handcuff the ring leader and cover his head.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們拷上了團伙的頭目並蓋住他的頭。

sentences.english: The team posed as drug dealers to trap the ringleaders.
sentences.chinese: 該隊隊員裝扮成毒品販子，誘捕罪犯頭目。

sentences.english: The head gangster, of course, cared nothing about being half-naked, and put off his underwear.
sentences.chinese: 強盜頭目當然不會在乎赤膊，於是就脫內衣。

sentences.english: Little attention is being given to the world's newly-appointed top terrorist.
sentences.chinese: 這個新任命的恐怖組織頭目幾乎沒有受到關注。

sentences.english: The addlehead's henchman living in the woods with all those filthy beasts.
sentences.chinese: 一個小頭目，和一堆骯髒的怪獸住在樹林裏。

sentences.english: The gang leader decided that the informer must be taken for a ride.
sentences.chinese: 歹徒頭目決定要將告密者用汽車綁架去幹掉。

sentences.english: I try to fight all boss in this game with hand gun and silver bullet gun.
sentences.chinese: 我嘗試以手槍還有銀彈槍打倒這款遊戲裏的所有頭目。

sentences.english: My job is to investigate Joe Banana who is the head of a big charity .
sentences.chinese: 我的任務是調查一家大型慈善組織的頭目喬巴拿納。

sentences.english: My job is to investigate Rachel Banana which is the head of a big charity.
sentences.chinese: 我的任務是檢查一家大型慈善組織的頭目喬巴拿納。

sentences.english: Jeff han official on the gold floor gold chair, become the leader of the Kowloon chamber of commerce.
sentences.chinese: 韓志傑正式坐上了金樓的金椅，成爲九龍商會的頭目。

definition: to parade sb through the streets/to march or parade in the streets
variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
to glare like a tiger watching his prey (idiom)/to eye covetously
